dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notification of Claimed Infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 04, 2005 10:29 AM
To: Ekaterina.Bondar@cascadefilm.ru
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notification of Claimed Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Notification of Claimed Infringement
Date:         Wed, 4 May 2005 17:58:26 +0400
From:         Ekaterina Bondar <Ekaterina.Bondar@cascadefilm.ru>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <copyright@theplanet.com>
CC:         Pavel Oganov <pavlcasc@online.ru>



Dear Sirs!



We want to inform you that the illegal web-site www.imax-nescafe.com
<http://www.imax-nescafe.com/>   was placed in your hosting
http://www.theplanet.com <http://www.theplanet.com/>



According to the license agreement between   IMAX Corporation (company
established according to the legislation of Canada)  and BFC Cinemas LTD
company established according to the legislation of Russian Federation), BFC
Cinemas LTD is the only official company on the territory of Russia which
has a right to use IMAX trade mark on the territory of Russia. BFC Cinemas
ltd obtains all the necessary documents concerning IMAX trade mark usage.
BFC Cinema LTD is  the  owner of the officially registered web-site
www.nescafe-imaxcinema.ru <http://www.nescafe-imaxcinema.ru/> .

Illegally created site contains inauthentic information and violates
regulations of Law # 3520-1 dated as of September 23^rd 1992 ?On trade
marks, service signs and goods point of origin naming?.



Such Law violations can cause responsibility according:

~    * Administrative code of Russian Federation (article 14.10. Illegal
~      use of a registered trade mark)
~    * Law # 3520-1 dated as of September 23^rd 1992 On trade marks,
~      service signs and appellation of origin?. (Article 46. Illegal use
~      of a registered trade mark)
~    * Criminal code of Russian Federation  (article 180. Repeated
~      illegal use of a registered trade mark or/and illegal use of a
~      registered trade mark that caused considerable damage)

It should be mentioned that illegal website contains images of such brands
like Panasonic, Nescafe, Reebok, Coca-cola etc. BFC Cinemas LTD has
concluded agreements for advertisement placing with companies mentioned
before. No other company has a right to advertise abovementioned companies.

Taking into consideration all abovementioned we kindly request you to close
down illegal web-site www.imax-nescafe.com <http://www.imax-nescafe.com/> .
We are ready to provide you necessary documents if needed.



Truly yours,

Bondar Ekaterina

Cascadefilm LTD and BFC Cinemas Legal Adviser

(acting on the basis of the power of attorney dated as of April 29th, 2005)



        http://www.cascadefilm.ru/


*Ekaterina Bondar*
/Legal adviser/         *Cascade film LTD*
Russia, Moscow, Vtoroi Smolenskii per. 1/4
Ekaterina.Bondar@cascadefilm.ru <mailto:Ekaterina.Bondar@cascadefilm.ru>

tel:
fax:         +70952415903
+70952414838



/Add me to your address book.../
<https://www.plaxo.com/add_me?u=8590807661&v0=1730062&k0=1069812484>
/Want a signature like this?/ <http://www.plaxo.com/signature>



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
